column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////But let's move on to the food. My ramen came with thick noodles
column7: and the broth of course. Everything was superb and really reminded me of my time in Japan. I didn't try any of their appetizers but they have a good selection if you're looking for something to supplement your ramen. Service was so bad however that it left a bad taste in my mouth
column8: no matter how good the food was.
